name: * Justice *
text: Highly recommended for a gluten free choice. The house gluten free crust is my favorite!! With all the selections you're sure to get the best of whatever your flavor is. Love the staff. Fun, polite and considerate of allergies. They make sure to take care of your needs.

name: Jennifer Riccio
text: We got build your own pizza still reasonably priced and like can custom what you want. Fresh, delish, and cooked in brick oven. The garlic cheese knots are good but if you are not a big garlic fan you probably will not like it. See photo of garlic knots.

name: Sam Dolan
text: So many delicious toppings to choose from!! Their dough is nice and thin and bakes up crispy. Will definitely be returning.

name: Kelly Dunn
text: Great place to eat. Everyone gets to make their own pizza. I love the garlic pesto sauce mixed with alfredo sauce!

name: Mrs Brown
text: EXCELLENT üëçüëçüëç customer service. Tasty food. Good quality. My husband, three teenagers, and I left happy and satisfied.

name: Elecia Shaffer
text: This was my first time at blaze and it was so good in ready to go again. The girl behind the counter was super adorable. I loved it

name: Thomas Alberts
text: The first time eating @ the 1 on Sunset in Henderson. Probably won't go back. Some of the staff and manager don't have a clue-- very rude and was told we should tell the first person you talk to, that we would like our pizza-her exact words-welldone. Hmm. That's new? Am I right? wrong

text: I love the ingredients, the drinks, and the atmosphere. As far as the actual taste, it is definitely lacking flavor. Didnt really taste like anything. I prefer Pizza Rev over this place unfortunately.

text: First timer to Blaze Pizza. I'm from the east coast, cool concept. Great price on build your own. Tasted good. Interested in a franchise.

text: The place is really good, it was really cheap and fast. The Pizza I got was really delicious. The S'more Pie was also a really good and tasty. The inside of Blaze Pizza is really nice with wood furnishing, it is also really clean. The workers were really polite and helpful.

name: Gabrielle Bedell

text: I love Blaze Pizza because of the options available but sometimes it‚Äôs not always made the same way even though you get to choose what you want. It all depends on who is making it. At times it‚Äôs done perfectly and sometimes it‚Äôs either too ‚Ä¶More

name: Ralph Tiebel
text: This location is about 20% the size of the one in the North end of the valley. The pizza is just as good though. I noticed that the acoustics were better as the place had special insulation in the ceiling. ‚Ä¶More

name: Shirley Becerra
text: Good variety of toppings you can choose from to build your own pizzas, especially the cheeses. Goat, mozzarella, ovalini, feta, ricotta, parmesan.  They have a Vegan version of chorizo too. Yum!

name: Daniel Schlyter
text: Always great pizza. If you 'build your own" you choose your toppings and if you want more cheese or moore olives or more pepperoni, just ask. Unfortunately if you order thru the spp they are stingy on the cheese and toppings.

name: Phelicia DeRosier
text: I love that I can eat at Blaze on my current diet plan. Last time, I had a marvelous 1/2 pizza with a keto crust, white sauce, cheese, chicken, bacon and spinach with a lovely 1/2 salad. So good!

name: Edwin Miranda
text: Always a great place to eat delicious build-your-own pizza üòã the staff is super friendly at this location and they keep the place pretty clean! The food quality was over all really good!

name: Doug M
text: Great place, great food, great people working there

name: Denese Scott
text: I think it's just me honestly.  I don't think I like the taste of Pizza anymore.  It was my last try.  But my friend LOVES it, so it is definately ME.

name: Pat Martin
text: Used Postmates for delivery.  I could see on the tracking that the delivery driver was on the next street. The only way to contact was by email, by then the driver was gone and order marked complete. We waited an hour,  and now we have to start over our go thru a drive thru, going to Mc Donald's. To hungry to wait another hour.

name: Evlyn Myles
text: It was my first time there and it was Delicious. And I will be going back again. And the price was Great.

text: A neat little pizza experience. You choose your sauce, toppings and dough ranging from cauliflower, gluten free to keto. They also have an app that does delivery but it varies by market. Everytime I have been here the employees provide great customer service. Would recommend if you like good pizza and vegan alternatives.

text: Very quick and delicious pizza and the service was awesome! I was torn between two signature pizzas so they made a half and half pizza for my indecisive self! Will probably be a regular quick dinner bite in our rotation!

name: Alexandra TOTHOVA
text: Love it. The best self made pizza in town.

text: Nice location and clean store. The music was a little loud, but with how busy it got right as they opened it made sense. ‚Ä¶More

text:
Love the Build Your Own Pizza option that allows you to curate your own unique pizza without being charged extra for extra toppings or for adding toppings.
Great crust options too including cauliflower, and keto crusts.

text: Love this place. They are always friendly  professional  and get are pizza ready in time. I went yesterday during rush hour they where busy. Had to wait a bit! Some people are rude and get mad but what do you expect it‚Äôs rush hour. I think they are great.

name: Jordan Willoby
text: This is a very nice location with good food and friendly staff.  The building is cleaner than most fastfood joints and has a very nice atmosphere. They help newcomers with ordering and practice eco friendly operations.  Overall very impressed with the customer experience and great food

text: Always enjoy Blaze Pizza when I get a chance to stop by.  Could use more low sugar drink choices, but the drinks they have are good, just like the food.

text: Customer service was great! I loved being able to build my own pizza at an affordable price. The restaurant was clean.

name: Jennifer Tiss
text: Went for the first time it was amazing! The keto crust was awesome! Making it a definite regular!

text: Over priced. You should be able to get way more toppings than what you pay for. The employees were not very friendly or helpful. The pizza tastes ok.

text: Staff very friendly we tasted better at Blaze at WDW Disney Springs in Orlando!

name: richard udvardi
text: Overpriced.  You could make it yourself at home and it's nothing special. Still ok to eat at and good service

name: M F
text: If you like personal pizzas with a lot of options this is the place. I love the build your own with the high rise crust. It's great because you can add as much as you want with no extra charge. Also if you like veggies they have a huge selection to add to your pizza. I also love their blood orange lemonade so good.

text: I always love the food and service here. Tonight my view is even escalated beyond my past visits. The crew was exceptional in their service, attention and orderly executed.  Fast food done healthy and right!

name: Shawn Garreffa
text: They have a keto crust with only 6 carbs, and it tastes great.

name: Keri Cadmium
text: I like the experience they give u. It's set up like subway how u pick crust(bread) sauce, cheese & toppings as u slide down the counter of options & they add everything in front of u & ask if it's enough, then they cook it for u in their Wood-fired brick ovens. Definitely worth a trip to check it out.

name: jean buckner

text: Really good pizza, however during busy times the line can get a bit long. Overall, a very clean restaurant and delicious food. Will be back!

text: Excellent customer service, fresh ingredients, fair prices, pizzas are cooked in a fire oven. Much better and much healthier than your typical pizza place. Gourmet pizza for a very reasonable price.

text: Great food and customer service. A diffident hit and recommendation

name: Nate Yaun

name: Deb NW
text: Amazing pizza!!  There are actually healthy options here that are fabulous!  Give it try!  You won't regret it.

name: tui Mataafa
text: Yo these guys are the best like seriously its not the pizza keeps going back its the service

text: This is a great quick place to eat pizza that is yummy and made with real ingredients!!! You want fast food to be actually food. We go all the time but every year we make sure to go on March 14th to get pizza for $3.14!!! Everone gets to pick any toppings that they want and gets their own pie!

name: Vegas Girl
text: Its like a Chipotle, but with Pizza. And a total California Hipster Vibe , and theres no straws, So this place is Total California Liberal. Excellent Pizza!!

name: Tanya Crisafi
text: This concept is awesome. The pizza cooks quick. They have fresh ingredients.  The only down side is the entrance and parking are awful. You can't turn in if there is car leaving or backing out . There are very few spots to park.

name: Bryan Reid
text: Had a school fundraiser for my child. Totally awesome that they were willing to donate part of the proceeds to the school. The food was good. I really enjoyed the taste of it being cooked in the brick oven.

name: Nik Schulz
text: Tasty pizza and quick service.  Lots of options for crust type as well

name: Rose Fausett
text: Was not impressed didn't like any part of my pizza.

name: Jon Zander
text: Discovered this chain while in Riverside, California.  Very happy to find it here near home.  Follows the same build-it-as-you-order formula as other recent fast food chains.  Blaze has ingredients usually not found at other pizza restaurants.  Fast cooking and friendly staff.

name: Karin Tenney
text: Create your own pizza with all the topping you like for only $8.25. It was fast and delicious!

name: Wil Hardiman
text: Everything on the menu is delicious. It's clean inside and the service is fast. You're going to enjoy eating here.

name: M. P.
text: Awesome place! There is nothing better than fresh made pizza. If you've never been here it's like Chiptole, but for pizza. They also have gluten free options.

name: Roberto Molina

text: Sales person totally bypassed me.  Asked the white couple how  they were doing and how many pizzas they wanted and I said one.  She still didn't greet me or apologize.

name: Marcella Dean
text: Really good pizza & friendly staff

name: Kerwin Sands
text: Great pizza with great options. I love being able to try new things on a pizza without worrying about making the pizza more expensive with each topping.

name: Sheena Jennings
text: This place is awesome! You can all the toppings you want and how you want for 8 bucks! The staff is very nice and the establishment is clean. It's my son and mines favorite place to hang out and eat together.

name: John Hancock

name: Aly Smith

name: Tornetta Hall

text: Awesome food

text: It was good. My pizza was a little cold though. I took it home, to heat & eat later.

name: Veronica Vidrio
text: Very tasty pizza and fast service

name: Douglas W
text: New keto pizza crust is great... hopefully the crust upcharge comes down a little over time.

name: Katina Oliver
text: Love the prices and pizza.

name: CALI BUTLER
text: So yummy

name: Brandie Prado
text: This pizza joint never fails us. Made to order in front of you. They have an awesome array of drinks to choose from. Make sure to check it out.

name: Keisha Carter
text: Customer service was great. This was my third visit. I enjoyed the pizza.

name: Taylor Gault
text: I love coming to Blaze! Fresh, fire roasted pizza is amazing! I also love that they have gluten free and vegan options (vegan cheese! Yes!)
